Group hierarchy: I've reduced the amout of storage of the instances because it was dimensionated in case of a big peak of requests arrive, I prefere to have less space (and maybe use another S3 if it's necessary in the future) rather than
reduce the cpu/ram of the instances. Also I've reduced the amount of elastic ip's from 12 to 10 per instance. So with that change alone the budget is archived.
